Package cc.jayv.monopoly3

Class DialogContainer

java.lang.Object
cc.jayv.monopoly3.DialogContainer
Direct Known Subclasses:
DialogContainerAbout, DialogContainerAuction, DialogContainerDebugLog, DialogContainerForfeit, DialogContainerGameEditor, DialogContainerImprovements, DialogContainerJail, DialogContainerMortgage, DialogContainerPurchaseProperty, DialogContainerStartGame
public abstract class DialogContainer extends Object
A template for dialog creation. Provides abstract methods for obtaining the JDialog object that is shown to the user, and infrastructure for modifying contents of the dialog according to game state.

    • initLabelTitle

      protected void initLabelTitle(String title, String iconResource)
      Initialize the label used for dialogs. Ensures that dialogs have a more standardized appearance.
      Parameters:
      title - The content of the title label.
      iconResource - A string indicating a resource that will be loaded as the icon for the title label.

    • arrangeComponents

      protected abstract void arrangeComponents()
      Arrange the GUI components within the dialog using class-specific MigSpec

    • setStateOfActionButton

      public abstract void setStateOfActionButton(ActionsGUI action, boolean isEnabled)
      Set a particular button to be enabled or disabled, by providing the corresponding Action key implemented by the GenericButtonActionListener.
      Parameters:
      action - The action which the corresponding button will have its state set.
      isEnabled - The state of the button.

    • getDialog

      public JDialog getDialog()
      Obtain the JDialog instantiated by the container class.
      Returns:
      The JDialog within the container.
